actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend Chapter 23, title 38, United States Code, so as to provide that where death occurs in a State home, the Administrator shall pay the actual cost (not to exceed $300) of the burial and funeral, and transport the body to the place of burial in the same or any other State.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to pay the actual cost (not to exceed $300) of the burial and funeral expenses of a veteran whose death occurs in a State home.
